meta.name: Radio Free Asia
meta.about: Radio Free Asia brings reliable, timely news to people living in Asian countries that censor or restrict free media.
meta.single_line_address: 2025 M St NW, Washington D.C., DC 20036

meta.name: 自由亞洲粵語 RFA Cantonese
meta.single_line_address: 2025 M St NW, Washington D.C., DC 20036

meta.name: Radio Free Asia
meta.about:
Radio Free Asia provides accurate and timely news and information to Asian countries whose governments prohibit access to a free press. RFA is mandated to broadcast to China, Tibet, North Korea, Vietnam, Cambodia, Laos, and Myanmar. Guided by the core principles of freedom of expression and opinion, RFA serves its viewers and listeners by providing information critical for informed decision-making.

Radio Free Asia broadcasts in 9 languages: Mandarin, Cantonese, Burmese, Korean, Lao, Khmer, Tibetan, Uyghur, and Vietnamese. Each RFA language service is distinctive, reflecting the particular culture, language, and preferences of its listeners.

meta.name: RFA 自由亞洲粵語
meta.about:
自由亞洲電台 (Radio Free Asia) 總部設在美國華盛頓，為言論自由受限的亞洲國家和地區提供完整而免費的新聞報道。致力以多媒體形式發送新聞，成為一個讓大眾獲得可靠消息的平台。
